csv.sampleSize: Percentage of dataframe to be sampled -> float
csv.preprocessedCSVPath: Path to save preprocessed dataframe -> string
csv.randomState: Random state to replicate results-> int
csv.preprocessedTrainPath: Path to save the preprocessed train dataframe -> string
csv.preprocessedValPath: Path to save preprocessed val dataframe -> string
csv.preprocessedTestPath: Path to save preprocessed test dataframe -> string

summarization.modelName: Hugging face model name for summarization -> string
summarization.maxTokens: Maximum tokens as per hugging face model -> int
summarization.contentMaxLength: Max length of summarized content -> int
summarization.contentMinLength: Min length of summarized content -> int
summarization.lengthPenalty: Length penalty for the text -> float
summarization.earlystoppingFlag: Boolean value for early stopping -> bool
